Galois Inc have just announced the first release of their Crux-Mir and Crux-LLVM verifier.
https://crux.galois.com/
https://twitter.com/atombeast/status/1314621810697146369?s=20

I'm happy to announce the first formal release of Crux, a new verification tool that builds on the same infrastructure as SAW but with a very different, more approachable user interface (similar to tools like CBMC). See http://crux.galois.com for more information!

- Aaron Tomb (@atombeast)

I think this (and other Rust verifiers) are going to be super-important for Rust because it let's you go beyond what the borrow checker and typechecker can express/detect.
This looks very cool. Thanks for sharing!
